languages.text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} противников от его атак. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа. Базовое значение снижения уклонения равно {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} атакующего% в случае {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак и (Восприятие атакующего + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} атакующего / 2)% в случае {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атак в ближнем бою{/g}. Общее значение параметра зависит от таких факторов, как {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} от используемого для атаки оружия, а также бонусы или штрафы от эффектов и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Dodge reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} противников от его атак. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа. Базовое значение снижения уклонения равно {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} атакующего% в случае {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак и (Восприятие атакующего + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} атакующего / 2)% в случае {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атак в ближнем бою{/g}. Общее значение параметра зависит от таких факторов, как {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} от используемого для атаки оружия, а также бонусы или штрафы от эффектов и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} противников от его атак. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа.
На снижение уклонения влияет оружие, которое использует персонаж.

Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} противников от его атак. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа.
На снижение уклонения влияет оружие, которое использует персонаж.

languages.text: Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie sehr ein Charakter die Chancen seiner Gegner verringert, seinen Angriffen erfolgreich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}. Je höher der Wert dieses Parameters ist, desto effektiver ist der Angriff des Charakters. Die grundlegende Ausweichreduzierung entspricht bei {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Angreifers% und bei {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} (Wahrnehmung des Angreifers + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Angreifers / 2)%. Dieser Wert kann durch verschiedene Faktoren modifiziert werden, beispielsweise {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}, die von der eingesetzten Waffe gewährt werden, und Boni oder Mali aus Effekten oder {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}.
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie sehr ein Charakter die Chancen seiner Gegner verringert, ihren Angriffen erfolgreich {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen{/g}. Je höher der Wert dieses Parameters ist, desto effektiver wird der Angriff des Charakters sein. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} wird von der Waffe beeinflusst, die der Charakter benutzt.

Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie sehr ein Charakter die Chancen seiner Gegner verringert, seinen Angriffen erfolgreich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}. Je höher der Wert dieses Parameters ist, desto effektiver ist der Angriff des Charakters. Die grundlegende Ausweichreduzierung entspricht bei {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Angreifers% und bei {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} (Wahrnehmung des Angreifers + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Angreifers / 2)%. Dieser Wert kann durch verschiedene Faktoren modifiziert werden, beispielsweise {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}, die von der eingesetzten Waffe gewährt werden, und Boni oder Mali aus Effekten oder {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}.

languages.text: Ce paramètre détermine dans quelle mesure le personnage réduit les chances des ennemis d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ses attaques. Plus la valeur de ce paramètre est élevée, plus l'attaque du personnage est efficace. La Réduction d'esquive de base est égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'attaquant % pour les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et à (Perception de l'attaquant + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant / 2)% pour les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}. Cette valeur peut varier en fonction de différents facteurs, dont les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conférés par l'arme utilisée pour l'attaque et tout bonus ou pénalité appliqués par des effets ou des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce paramètre détermine dans quelle mesure le personnage réduit les chances des ennemis d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} ses attaques. Plus la valeur de ce paramètre est élevée, plus l'attaque du personnage est efficace. La {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} est affectée par l'arme utilisée par le personnage.

Ce paramètre détermine dans quelle mesure le personnage réduit les chances des ennemis d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ses attaques. Plus la valeur de ce paramètre est élevée, plus l'attaque du personnage est efficace. La Réduction d'esquive de base est égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'attaquant % pour les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et à (Perception de l'attaquant + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant / 2)% pour les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}. Cette valeur peut varier en fonction de différents facteurs, dont les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conférés par l'arme utilisée pour l'attaque et tout bonus ou pénalité appliqués par des effets ou des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.

languages.text: 此属性决定可以降低目标敌人成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}的几率。此属性值越高，角色的攻击就越不容易被敌人闪避。 近战攻击与远程攻击闪避减免的计算方式不同，{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击的闪避减免等于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}%，而{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的闪避减免等于（攻击者感知+攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}/2）%。此数值还会受其他因素影响，例如攻击者使用的武器，或双方受到的各种{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果等等。
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此属性决定可以降低目标敌人成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}的几率。此属性值越高，角色的攻击就越不容易被敌人闪避。 近战攻击与远程攻击闪避减免的计算方式不同，{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击的闪避减免等于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}%，而{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的闪避减免等于（攻击者感知+攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}/2）%。此数值还会受其他因素影响，例如攻击者使用的武器，或双方受到的各种{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果等等。

languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Dodge reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

languages.text: Este parámetro determina cuánto reduce un personaje la probabilidad de que el enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} sus ataques. Cuanto mayor sea este parámetro, más efectivo es el ataque del personaje. La reducción de esquiva básica es igual al {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del atacante % para ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} y al (Percepción del atacante + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del atacante / 2) % para {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Este valor puede modificarse mediante diversos factores como las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} del arma empleada y las bonificaciones y penalizaciones aplicadas por efectos o {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este parámetro determina cuánto reduce un personaje la probabilidad de que el enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} sus ataques. Cuanto mayor sea este parámetro, más efectivo es el ataque del personaje. La {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} depende del arma con la que se ataque.

languages.text: このパラメータにより、キャラクターの敵がそのキャラクターの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できる確率が下がる程度が決まる。パラメータの値が高いほど、そのキャラクターの攻撃が効果的になる。 {g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃の基本の回避減少は、アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}%に等しい。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃は、（アタッカーの認知力 + アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g} / 2）%となる。この値は、攻撃に使用した武器による{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}や、効果や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるボーナスまたはペナルティなど、様々な要素の影響を受ける。
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このパラメータにより、キャラクターの敵がそのキャラクターの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できる確率が下がる程度が決まる。パラメータの値が高いほど、そのキャラクターの攻撃が効果的になる。 {g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃の基本の回避減少は、アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}%に等しい。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃は、（アタッカーの認知力 + アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g} / 2）%となる。この値は、攻撃に使用した武器による{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}や、効果や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるボーナスまたはペナルティなど、様々な要素の影響を受ける。

languages.text: Bu parametre, bir karakterin yapacağı saldırıdan düşmanın başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} olasılığının ne kadar azalacağını belirler. Bu parametrenin değeri ne kadar yüksekse karakterin saldırısı da o kadar etkili olur. Taban kaçınma azaltımı, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} saldırılarda %saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliğine; {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarında{/g} ise %(saldırganın Algı niteliği + saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği / 2) formülüne eşittir. Bu değer, saldırı için kullanılan silahın sağladığı {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} ile etki veya {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerden{/g} kaynaklanan bonus veya ceza puanları gibi çeşitli faktörlerle değişikliğe uğrayabilir.
languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Base dodge reduction is equal to attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}% for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks and (attacker's Perception + attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} / 2)% for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. This value can be modified by a variety of factors, such as {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} provided by the weapon used for the attack and any bonuses or penalties from effects or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
